Name: NEON STRUCT
About the game: You are Jillian Cleary: an ex-spy on the run, framed for treason and hunted by your former agency. You must move in secret, survive off the grid, and find a way to clear your name. Old friends and new allies will lend their support; but with the eyes of the world upon you, who can you trust? Stealth Keep in the shadows, move in silence, and stay out of sight. Escape from tight situations by scrambling your enemies' vision. Enhance your performance with black market stims. World Explore a concrete-and-neon brutalist vision of the modern surveillance state. Undertake eight missions spanning two continents. Meet a diverse range of interesting characters. Music Featuring an 18-song soundtrack by electronic rock band The Home Conversion .
Meta Title: NEON STRUCT: May 20, 2015, Minor Key Games and Full Overview
